Title: Orange Sticker
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Tom Spezialy
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Margaret Qualley
Plot: Nora awakens in the midst of an earthquake to find Kevin missing. The Murphys are left reeling after Evie's disappearance.
